channel.title: Npc talk from client.java?
channel.description: can i make an npc talk 1 time using my client.java? im making random event so i need the old man to say "aaah "+playerName+". just the one i needed" or something :D please help me. wat to put in client.java ?

item.title: Npc talk from client.java?
item.dc:creator: @bobsisland bobsisland
item.description:
@bobsisland wrote:

[quote=“dragonchain, post:10, topic:201290”][quote author=bobsisland link=topic=265954.msg2198284#msg2198284 date=1208612812]
didnt work i just got disconnected when i spawned him
[/quote]An overflow? Or a position you are standing at? I don’t think theres an id 2253, did you change it?[/quote]

yep and i added it in NPCHandler. i tihnk its because it doesnt have any killerid thing ill just avoid using player names then … but thank you!

Read full topic

item.title: Npc talk from client.java?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

[quote=“bobsisland, post:7, topic:201290”][quote author=dragonchain link=topic=265954.msg2198262#msg2198262 date=1208612084]

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2253) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) { client c = (client) PlayerHandler.players[GetNpcKiller(i)]; npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Greetings c.playerName+"; } }
[/quote]

compiled fine trying it out now

if it works i have to find a way to remove the npc :P[/quote]

Well you wouldn’t be able to make a fine random event if you don’t know java much, good luck anyways.

Read full topic

item.title: Npc talk from client.java?
item.dc:creator: @bobsisland bobsisland
item.description:
@bobsisland wrote:

yes but… it still wouldnt be the same… i cant use playerName… its a part of the random event thing so i need it…

EDIT:

cant i just say

o and if it would work i created a string in npcHandler:

npcHandler.playerNameToSay = playerName; if (npcHandler.npcs[i].npcType == 2253) { npcHandler.npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcHandler.npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcHandler.npcs[i].textUpdate = "Ahhhh "+playerNameToSay+". just the one i needed"; }
??
}

item.title: Npc talk from client.java?
item.dc:creator: @dragonchain dragonchain
item.description:
@dragonchain wrote:

Naaaaaa… see where it says if (misc.random2(50 >=1) {?

Change it to if (misc.random2(50 >=20)
^ Doesn’t make it say it all the time…

item.title: Npc talk from client.java?
item.dc:creator: @bobsisland bobsisland
item.description:
@bobsisland wrote:

[quote=“anthonycerda, post:1, topic:201291”]You have to put it in npchandler.java

if (npcs[i].npcType == 2253) { if (misc.random2(50) >= 1) { npcs[i].updateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true; npcs[i].textUpdate = "Get an Anti D Shield here before hunting Mithril Dragons!"; } } [/quote]

no cause then it says it all the time… didnt you read my post? i think it got messed up cause it thoud client.java was a website or something

EDIT: and no the +playerName+ wouldnt work as the npchandler is a server file i think so its the same for everyone on server while client.java is a provate file that isnt the same for everyone as stuff depends on wat ur ints are 0 or 1 etc…

Read full topic
